verses.roman:
tāra tale, tāra tale kari' anukrama
udyāna bhari' vaise bhakta karite bhojana

synonyms: tāra tale—below them; tāra tale—below them; kari'—in this way; anukrama—consecutively; udyāna bhari'-filling the entire garden; vaise—sit; bhakta—all the devotees; karite bhojana—to take lunch.
translation: In this way all the devotees sat down to take their lunch in consecutive lines, one beside the other.
